metadata.title: CVE-2022-48756 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dsi: invalid parameter check in msm_dsi_phy_enable The functionperforms a check on the "phy" input parameter, however, it is used beforethe check. Initialize the "dev" variable after the sanity check to avoid apossible NULL pointer dereference. Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493860 ("Nullpointer dereference")

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
